forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 60F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
